text: June Marlowe (November 6, 1903 â€“ March 10, 1984) was an American actress. She worked a lot in the 1920s. She played schoolteacher Miss Crabtree in six of the Our Gang children's comedies. Those movies included Teacher's Pet, School's Out and Love Business. Marlowe was born in St. Cloud, Minnesota. She died from Parkinson's disease at the age of 80. Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:1903 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People from St. Cloud, Minnesota
title: June Marlowe
